name: kitsch
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
art, decorative objects, or design considered by many people to be ugly, without style, or false but enjoyed by other people, often because they are funny: His home's full of 1950s kitsch.

Related word
kitschy
Add to word list
Add to word list
showy art or cheap, decorative objects that are attractive to people who are thought to lack any appreciation of style or beauty: She collects all sorts of kitsch, like these ceramic figurines of movie stars.
